NinjaScriptVersion.Name: FKS Trading Systems v1.0.0
NinjaScriptVersion.Description: FKS Trading Systems - Master Plan Implementation
NinjaScriptVersion.Author: FKS Development Team
NinjaScriptVersion.Notes:
Production-ready FKS Trading Systems with consolidated architecture.
Master Plan Implementation Features: - Hardcoded production parameters per master plan - Minimal user configuration required - Market-specific optimization for Gold Futures (GC) - Component-based architecture with health monitoring - 3 consolidated AddOns (down from 6 original files) - 4 advanced indicators with AI capabilities - 1 unified strategy with 4 setup detection methods - Production-ready signal quality threshold (0.65+)
Ready for immediate deployment with minimal configuration.
